attributes.action: Waive student loan for Frontline staff working in the NHS during this pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: Many Frontline workers are currently doing their ultimate best to care for the thousands of patients in hospital due to the cover-19 pandemic. Putting their own lives at risk, they have taken the oath to save lives of others. As a country, the least we can do for these frontline workers who have sacrificed a lot, is to waive off their student loan that they have after graduating from University. During this pandemic, these frontline workers have gone to work everyday to fight this virus!
attributes.background: Would like the Parliament to waive off the huge student loan debt that frontline workers have after finishing university, as a gesture of appreciation for all the hard work they are currently doing in the frontline of the country's NHS.
